FastTrack/FastTrack/source/FastingHistor.description: FastingHistory class manages 30-session history with FIFO pruning. Storage key: 'fastingHistory'. Key methods: saveSession(Dictionary), getHistory(), getStats(period), getTotalHours(period). Session structure: {date, duration, goalAchieved, avgHeartRate, avgStress, startTime, endTime}

FastTrack/FastTrack/source/FastingSessio.description: Fixed bug in stopFast() where startTime was used after being set to null for duration calculation. Now saves startTime to sessionStartTime variable before clearing.

.auto-claude/specs/001-fasting-history-l.description: Final verification completed for Fasting History Log feature. All 8 subtasks implemented: FastingHistory.mc (storage), FastingSession.mc (integration), FastingHistoryView.mc + FastingHistoryDelegate.mc (UI), menu integration, and end-to-end verification. Feature ready for QA sign-off.
